name: Lost in Transmission (NorthWestSouth, BryanTan, Momokzaii, arifimran, UjiMatcha, Truman0802)
name_original: Lost in Transmission (NorthWestSouth, BryanTan, Momokzaii, arifimran, UjiMatcha, Truman0802)
description:
Play as a military force radio operator in a time of war, and pick up all radio messages that constantly change in frequency.

Developed within 48 hours as a submission for UOWMKDU Sem Jam September 2021.
